# ➕ All: Add-ons Total: 37

These are modifiers that any players can acquire. There are helpful, harmful, and Impostor add-ons. Each one is unique in the way it affects the player.

Role Count
Harmful10
Helpful19
Impostor7
Neutral1

# Harmful

Avenger | Bewilder | Diseased | Disregarded | Fragile | Ghoul | Oblivious | Rascal | Sunglasses | Unlucky | Void Ballot | Workhorse

# Helpful

Antidote | Autopsy | Aware | Bait | Beartrap | Burst | Double Shot | Glow | Gravestone | Lazy | Loyal | Lucky | Necroview | Nimble | Reach | Schizophrenic | Seer | Sleuth | Torch | Tiebreaker | Watcher

# Impostor

Clumsy | LastImpostor | Madmate | Mare | Mimic | Stealer | Swift

# Neutral

Egoist | Lovers


Settings
Below are settings to make the game more balanced based on your lobby's style of gameplay:
  • Display Add-Ons next to the role name
    • ON: Add-Ons will be displayed next to players' Roles
    • OFF: Add-Ons will not be displayed next to players' Roles
  • Players can have multiple Add-Ons
    • ON: Players can have more than one Add-On (up to 15)
    • OFF: Add-Ons will be handed out as they normally would
  • Add Brackets To Add-Ons
    • ON: Brackets will appear around a players’ Add-Ons for a cleaner look
    • OFF: Add-Ons will be displayed as they normally would
